title: Game-Mode: From Crowds to Ham
body:
In summary: All cc is replaced with damage, and all tenacity is replaced with defense. Example:

* If you have a stun, the stun is replaced with 20-200 damage, based on champion level
* If you have a silence, it's replaced with 15-150 damage, based on champion level
* If you have 35% tenacity, it's replaced with 15% resistance to all damage
* If you have cc immunity, it's replaced with 35% damage resistance
* If you have a cc breaker, it's replaced with a heal of some amount
* etc. etc.

I don't know how all the numbers would work out (or should) what's more important is: why do I propose this sort of game type? As the thread title suggest, it's a chance to turn every fight into un-mitigated fest of punching each other to death, instead of punching through crowd control. Is that brainless? MAYBE. Do I care? NO.
